```{r read}
base <- read.csv("data_with_signals_0.csv")
```

```{r read}
df1 <- read.csv("data_with_signals_1.csv")
df2 <- read.csv("data_with_signals_2.csv")
df3 <- read.csv("data_with_signals_3.csv")
df4 <- read.csv("data_with_signals_4.csv")

followup_col <- df1$followup
engagement_col <- df2$engagement
compliment_col <- df3$compliment
agreement_col <- df4$agreement

check <- base
check$followup <- followup_col
check$engagement <- engagement_col
check$compliment <- compliment_col
check$agreement <- agreement_col

```

```{r write}
write.csv(check, "data_with_all_signals.csv", row.names = FALSE)
```
